alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 8:44PM CDT until August 05 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Clay County in south central Nebraska... Fillmore County in south central Nebraska... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 844 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sutton, or 28 miles southwest of York, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Geneva, Strang, Milligan and Ohiowa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
